page.title: 14Heolgerrig Welsh Place-names
page.content: Bryn y Badell; Hill of the pan;bowl. Twyn Ddisgwylfa Mound of Expectations Waun y Gwair; Hay Meadow. Bryn Pica, Pointed hillock. Pant y Ffald;Hollow of the fold sheep Tir-ergyd; Shooting land. Coed cae Farm; Field of the Trees Bryn Mawr; Large hillock. Blaen-nant , Head of the Stream. Pen Llwynmelyn; Top of the Yellow Grove. Blaencanaid;Head of the Canaid river. Cefn Ffordd; Back of the road. Hendre Fawr; Large Homestead. Mynydd Aberdar; Aberdare Mountain. Maen Brych; Spotted Stone. Bryn y Giryddel; Home of Insh. Heolgerrig; Stoney road. Gellideg; Fair grove. Cwm Glo ; Coal valley. Brondeg ; Pleasant View.
